sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with jiao chang sha 絞腸沙 , twisting-intestines sand. Za bing zheng zhi zun sheng 雜病證治準繩 3: 乾霍亂，忽然心腹脹滿攪痛，欲吐不吐，欲瀉不瀉，躁亂憒憒 無奈，俗名攪腸沙者是也 , “Dry cholera: a sudden feeling of distension and fullness in heart and abdomen, with annoying pain. One wishes to vomit but does not. One has an urge to defecate but fails to defecate. [Patients] are extremely confused. This is commonly called ‘ annoying-intestines sand ’”.
